name: Daniel Wein
bio:
WEIN Daniel Wein
son of Louis & Elizabeth Wein
died Dec. 3, 1916 ae 35 yrs
Pte. David Charles Wein
born July 12, 1888
killed in action in France
died May 14, 1915
Mary Wein
died June 2, 1961 ae 82 yrs.
